name: Chrono Trigger: Character Library
overview: 'Chrono Trigger: Character Library' is essentially a bestiary containing every playable character and enemy (sprite) from 'Chrono Trigger'. The original game was released for the Japan-only Satellaview in 1995 and was developed by Squaresoft and published by Nintendo. It was later released as a bonus feature on 'Final Fantasy Chronicles', which included a newer version of Chrono Trigger.
